channel.title: Publishes from Joe Liu on LJ-Left Creations Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Publishes from Joe Liu on LJ-Left Creations Blog

item.title: New Landing Page
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: From now on, the Canva website is my landing page. More tidy, and bold, than my blog. Easily summarise what I do, not only myself, but for you. https://lj-leftcreations.my.canva.site/

item.title: Tote Bag Apron
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: I am so happy you helped recycle a tote bag to wear. Enjoy it! Do you need an ethical cloth when cooking? I have the Tote Bag Apron! Only Â£19.99 plus Post & Package Too expensive? Contact me here

item.title: Chatbot
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Scroll to the bottom and check it out! Use Crisp to do it. Thanks Hugo Addon page. However, just a nice feature, but I probably won’t reply as much as my social media.

item.title: Personal Contacts

item.description: (these are my personal contacts, as I put business account on the top) Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/joseph-liu-aut Instagram personal: https://www.instagram.com/thatisdrtruman/ Facebook personal: https://www.facebook.com/joseph.liu.7161953 Tiktok personal: https://www.tiktok.com/@thatisdrtruman Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/joseph-liu-9b022b1b0/ Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/liuj40149012 Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/heisdrtruman (Dormant) Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/heisdrtruman UPDATE 20 Dec 2023: GX.games account: https://gx.games/studios/220aa5a8-bca4-4917-90b2-53bbcd15afaf/

item.title: Youtube Dev Log Song 1
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Check it out here Now I have my first playlist, a series of dev logs of making my 3rd original song, it is for my old university’s film submission. Debutante Days https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1o3rw_0jIeFW7Qe0RZhkiXGWrtd2djDU

item.title: Fillup Status Site
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Fillup-status-app but in a browser, internet required: Your HP: 20 Roll Your coordinates: , Your abilities: Stomp Block Slide Teleport Triple Punch Your items: Lasoo Wall Mine Spear HP Bottle (Use: +5HP) To download the Android APK, go here, if you’re on PC and want to play it offine, save this page as a single file

item.title: First Business Card
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: When I go to conferences and events, I should give my business card to people. Since I don’t want to waste unneeded resources on business cards, I publish my card on the homepage and here. I will only print them for business card sweepstakes. QR code leads to this website.

item.title: I Can Make You A Website
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: https://www.fiverr.com/joe_liu_devmake/ MORE TO COME I now make your blog and/or portfolio website, like mine. If you want one, go to the fiverr website or contact me by pressing ‘Contact Me’ in the header. I take about 2-3 weeks to make it, starting at US$450, but if that’s too expensive, send me a form here, start the message with: –Blog/portfolio website discount– and you can have a website for cheaper.

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.2
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is the fourth post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here, or the third To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now have a browser version: Site for web app I now added ten checkboxes to mark in your player’s inventory. Whether you already have one of the items and/or abilities. Download Download

item.title: New Youtube Account
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: The link is at the header or footer. All my vids from other video social media are there. There you go, more people know about it, including those in Montana, USA. https://youtube.com/@LJ-LeftCreations It means you will see less of uploading on TikTok and Instagram, only of long videos though.

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.1
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the third post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now I have a browser version: Site for web app I now added two EditText boxes to mark in your player’s coordinates, bolded the title and slightly condense them features together. The HP bar (the number changes as you use the slider)

item.title: The LJ-Left Creations Projects Podcast Episode 0
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Hi, this is my prototype episode. Not published on podcast websites, until assured as suitable for publishing on podcast websites. Listen here or download Download/Play Episode 0 The pre-episode to my projects in podcast form. It will explain what my projects are, what I did, and what would I do to improve, and any changes to the project from previous episodes. Enjoy it.

item.title: LJ-Left Creations
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: I have just made a Facebook Page of my creative, media and technological enterprise. It will be where I will upload all my creations, and the progress of them. The page will also have links to try out my some free content, and in the future, how to buy other contents. Also, my Facebook tag now links to my ‘LJ-Left Creations’ page. Link: https://www.facebook.com/people/LJ-Left-Creations-by-Joe-Liu/61555492546128/ Black Version: White Version:

item.title: Fillup Status App
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the second post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, or here for the third post To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now, use browser version: Site for web app I made this app to organise my game better, by allowing players to roll their moves dice and slide their Health Point themselves. So far, only on Android 5.

item.title: Bejin Bot
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: FREE DOWNLOAD WIP (Still need texture and animation and bio) Bejin Bot A robot designed in Blender inspired by a robot from an Australian animator. Download here Still deciding how to colour it, and its purpose in a game, art or story. Name derived from ‘Begin’, ‘g’ soften to ‘j’, to reference my first character design in Blender. Other model pics of Bejin Bot: Update pending. model-download There you are, this version of Bejin Bot is fully copyleft

item.title: Sticky Note Cards and Game
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ðŸ’ŒðŸ‘Œ or HERE I always believe regardless of price, something homemade or unbought always has some soul, a priceless item. Simple to make: make an art with sticky notes and bookmarks, write your message or picture, and cover it with lots of redundant sticky notes for a game. If you remove the redundant notes correctly, you will get the right picture and message. If you would like a personalised card in this style, DM me on Linkedin, Facebook, or Tiktok, starting the message with “I would like a sticky note card.

item.title: Fillup
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 22 Jan 2024: After playing the game with some people and reviewing how to be more organised, I have made a Fillup Status app for players to track their HP and roll the dice themselves for the number of moves. Download it here or on ‘Fillup Status App’ page. A game I made in July to January 2023-24, now in its testing phase. The manual and documentation: https://shorturl.at/kuX29 The game layout: The empty playing board All basic items tokens ready to put in the game: All basic ability tokens ready to put in the game: There are 8 different abilities, each has 4 The healthboard: The player decides behind the wall what they want to do.

item.title: My DeviantArt Portfolio
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: https://www.deviantart.com/heisdrtruman Before I made my blog and portfolio website, I published some art content onto DeviantArt. Some of my favourite art I published there are: The Sunset Soldier painted figure for a Warhammer figurine painting competition, Frisbee Time (I splat paint on a square canvas and flung it around like a frisbee), Areal Figure (2018, where the area of the red circle matched the area of the green, yellow and blue shapes.

item.title: Music I Done and Setup
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is how I set up the microphone before I record my voice. For voice acting, singing, rapping or speaking. I made this out of a Samson USB Go Mic and a microphone cover. I first made this box out of acoustic foam attached to cardboard in February when I first made ‘Inspect’. And I bought a pop shield in front of the box to oppress spitting ‘p’ noise. I done this to minimise background when I sing.

item.title: My designed logo
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Look at the logo in the top left, or in the mobile’s case, the top. That is my logo. Being an Asian person, my name would be Liu Zu (Zu became Joe, which is formally Joseph). Swap over the positions of my western name, reading right to left, like Modern Arabic and ancient Chinese. That is how I named my business and my logo. To conclude, the name and the logo reflects my cultural upbringing with at-time-of-writing modern attractiveness and simplicity.

item.title: PECSOnline
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: PECSOnline PECSOnline was a software I made for my individual Bachelor’s Computer Science Degree project. If you want me to remake it for your use: Direct Contact me via any of my social media accounts (starting your message with: “Subject: Remake PECSOnline”) If you can’t see it: https://archive.org/embed/joseph-liu-pecs-online-playthrough The app was usable on the PC, on phone and tablet, via the internet and a browser app. It had user and child adding/modifying, PECS 1-3 or single symbols and 4-6 or sentence making.

item.title: Grabo
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: In July/August 2023, I worked on a My First Game Jam project called Grabo. Inspired by Kingdom Hearts III using Unreal Engine 4, I wanted to make an Unreal Engine 5 Game as a general 2D platformer. Grabo, a beartrap in a 2D platformer who needs to destroy all melty liquid vats. This is written in Unreal Engine 5.2.1 as a 2023 My First Game Jam entry ( https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2023 ).

item.title: I am Joe Liu
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: I am a person with autism but that does not mean I am incapable of living a great and fulfilling life! CV (working as of 18 December 2023): https://t.ly/aQKjU CV (tech relevant only): https://t.ly/xYDYr My dreams are to be a novelist of a unique series, developer/designer of various projects, singer-musician, actor and podcaster. I have a blog on all my works and my portfolio here. Notable works: Two original songs (‘Your Heroes Inside’ and ‘Inspect’) and accompanying music videos, as the sole director, producer, editor, composer, and singer-songwriter on TikTok, soon to be on YouTube.
